alert.note: Alert for Cass (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 29 at 11:08PM CDT until April 30 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kansas, including the following counties, Johnson KS and Miami. Portions of west central Missouri, including the following county, Cass. * WHEN...Until 215 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Lee`s Summit, Belton, Raymore, Paola, Spring Hill, Greenwood, Peculiar, Osawatomie, Louisburg, Lake Winnebago, Drexel, Cleveland, Freeman, Lake Annette, West Line, Chiles and Bucyrus. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
